name: Cinnamon-Chia Seed Bread
author: Lola Louise
summary: This light and sweet quick bread makes a perfect food gift, bake sale addition, or just breakfast side! It features chia seeds, which are high in omega 3's, and coconut milk instead of oil or butter. My family loves it warmed in the microwave for a few seconds!
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine flour, sugar, chia seeds, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl
Combine coconut milk beverage, egg, and vanilla extract in a separate bowl
Slowly stir into the flour mixture until combined
Pour batter into the prepared pan
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 25 to 35 minutes
